title: Adizero Adios 7 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description: Chase your next PR in these adidas Adizero running shoes. The breathable mesh upper rides on a mix of superlight Lightstrike cushioning and resilient Lightstrike Pro. The combination makes these shoes fast enough for race day while being able to stand up to everyday training. TORSIONRODS add a soft stiffness that increases force transfer in each stride. The result? A pair of running shoes that help you run faster (and longer) than ever before, all while feeling fresh on your feet.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Lightweight mesh upper; Flexible feel with support in key areas; TORSIONRODS increase force transfer; Lightstrike cushioning; Weight: 7.7 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 8 mm (heel: 27 mm / forefoot: 19 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Dash Grey / Solar Orange / Wonder Steel; Product code: GX6647
colors: Grey Three / Zero Metalic / Grey Five

title: adidas 4D Krazed Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: Everything gets hyper-charged on the adidas 4D Krazed Shoes. Not just the design, but the attitude too. You see it on the tooling, which is an innovative and supremely comfortable mix of 4D technology and EVA cushioning. There's a play of textures throughout, creating a highly visual statement of fluid lines and bold details — just look at the heel.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with stitched synthetic overlays; Textile lining; adidas 4D and EVA midsole; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Royal Blue; Product code: GX9594
colors: Orbit Grey / Silver Metallic / Metal Grey

title: Solarglide 5 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description: Whether you're building consistency, upping your distance or training for a personal best, Solarglide 5 are the shoes you leave by the door to support your goals every single day. They're packed with performance technology, from the BOOST midsole to the knit upper and the adidas LEP 2.0. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.

title: Lite Racer Adapt 4.0 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Essentials
description:
Waste not, want not. Slip into these adidas shoes and you're out the door without wasting a minute getting on with your day. The lightweight textile upper and lining have a flexible feel that moves with your foot. A Cloudfoam midsole offers above-and-beyond cushioning for all-day comfort. A molded heel piece provides extra support when you're on your feet for extended periods.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Slip-on construction; Textile upper; Textile lining; Molded TPU heel piece; Cloudfoam midsole; Synthetic outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Carbon / Core Black / Chalk White; Product code: GW8154
colors: Carbon / Core Black / Chalk White

title: Ultraboost 1.0 Indiana
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Bring your Hoosiers spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign is Brianna Copeland; a sophomore softball pitcher for Indiana University from Pelham, AL. She was named Freshman of the Week for her conference three times, set six state high-school records including 531 career strikeouts, has hit 28 career home runs, and earned the Defensive Player of the Year award. Off the softball field, she’s working hard in school, majoring in architecture.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Interchangeable webbing strips; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cream White / Team Victory Red; Product code: HQ5872
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

title: Terrex Agravic Flow 2.0 GORE-TEX Trail Running Shoes
subtitle: Women's TERREX
description: Slick rocks and soggy trails won't slow you down in these adidas trail running shoes. From the road to the trail and back again, they keep feet dry and comfortable with a breathable GORE-TEX lining that seals out moisture and LIGHTSTRIKE cushioning that keeps you light on your feet. Move swiftly over even the most rugged terrain with a lugged Continental™ Rubber outsole that offers extraordinary grip in wet or dry conditions.
details: Lace closure; Abrasion-resistant engineered mesh upper; GORE-TEX lining; Pro-Moderator support; Lightstrike cushioning; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Almost Lime / Pulse Lime / Turbo; Product code: H03383

title: Ultraboost 22 COLD.RDY 2.0 Shoes

description: When the adidas Ultraboost debuted in 2015, it set the standard for comfort and performance in a running shoe. Each new release raises the bar, and this one is no exception. These running shoes are built for cold-weather runs, featuring COLD.RDY to keep feet warm. The energy-returning BOOST midsole is reflective, so it shines bright from dusk to dawn. The Continental™ WinterGrip™ Rubber outsole ensures a secure grip on slick streets.

details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; ©Marvel; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Gold Metallic / Tribe Purple; Product code: GX9654

description:
Lightweight and comfortable, the Terrex Speed Ultra is packed with innovations that give athletes an edge. Tom Evans tested different versions of the shoe for two years and helped us craft it to completion. He then took it for a spin and won the Tarawera race wearing it. He thinks it's magic, but it's just skill paired with science. 

This shoe brings together many innovations to support you on your journey. Inspired by gravel bikes, the lug pattern of the outsole offers great traction. Combining two types of lightweight materials, the midsole cushions feet and gives energy back without compromising on stability. The tongue and heel tabs are padded for comfort and the upper is light, breathable and drainage-ready.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings; Perforated tongue; BOOST midsole and Lightstrike cushioning; Reflective print; Weight: 8.6 ounces; Continental™ Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Crystal White / Turbo; Product code: H03192
colors: Core Black / Crystal White / Turbo

Express your personal style in these adidas Forum Bold Shoes. The sneakers stay true to their '80s basketball roots while adding details like a platform outsole. Amp up the sophistication with premium leather and a subtle snakeskin deboss on the famous X-ankle detail. The terry lining and platform outsole add extra comfort. Wear them with your everyday jeans or your favorite outfit.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

Sitting on a lug rubber outsole, the soft EVA midsole cushions every stride on artificial turf courts.
